title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix in the grated Parmesan.
Drain the spaghetti and quickly mix with the egg-cheese mixture and pancetta.
Serve with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onions, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add grilled chicken and cream. Cook for 10 minutes.

title: Beans Curry
summary: This hearty, fibre-packed bean curry is a twist on the classic curry that delivers all the same satisfaction.

title: Cauliflower and spinach curry
summary: Need inspiration for a Meat-Free Monday meal? Make this cauliflower and spinach curry for a quick vegetarian dinner – using frozen veg means it comes together in no time for an easy midweek meal.
